title: Has Lewis lost it? Going up, going down in Hungary
summary: Lewis Hamilton will hope to use the F1 summer break to regroup and turn his ailing season around

qa_pairs.question: Which driver is seeking to improve their performance during the F1 summer break?
What is the typical purpose of the F1 summer break for teams and drivers?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: To regroup and reflect on performance
wrong_options: To conduct testing for the next season

qa_pairs.question: In which country did the recent race mentioned in the context of Lewis Hamilton's performance take place?
